events.text:
Greetings, puny Human!
It is I. The Mastermind Evil Overlord of the World!
Or M.E.O.W. for short...
I has come to bring evil upon your dwelling!
I can attack  [color=#22DD22]You[/color] and your [wave amp=50 freq=2] [color=#22DD22]precious possesions[/color] [/wave] 
by [color=#22DDDD]Right Clicking[/color] with my Claws!
Drat! You've summoned those cursed roomba vacuums?
No matter, I shall stop them with a few of my nasty [color=#22DDDD]hairballs[/color]!
By [color=#22DDDD]Left Clicking[/color]!
Fear me human, for I shall not stop until I destroy every single one of your [color=#22DD22]possessions[/color]!
Then I shall escape through your fully exposed [color=#DDDD22]Kitty Door[/color]!
